# IWorkState.CancellationToken property

Returns the `CancellationToken` controlling the work.

```csharp
public CancellationToken CancellationToken { get; }
```

## Remarks

The IsCancellationRequested property of `CancellationToken` should return the same value as [`Canceled`](Canceled.md).
